snippet: Hanergy Holding Group of China added to its international acquisitions with MiaSolé, a thin-film solar panel manufacturer that is considered one of Silicon Valley’s most promising young firms.
abstract: Hanergy Holding Group of China added to its international acquisitions with purchase of MiaSole, thin-film solar panel manufacturer that is considered one of Silicon Valley’s most promising young firms.

byline.original: By DIANE CARDWELL and KEITH BRADSHER
byline.contributor: Diane Cardwell reported from New York and Keith Bradsher from Hong Kong. Patrick Zuo contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Hanergy Holding Group of China added to its international acquisitions with MiaSolé, a thin-film solar panel manufacturer that is considered one of Silicon Valley’s most promising young firms.

headline.seo: Chinese Firm Buys an American Solar Technology Start-Up
headline.main: Chinese Firm Buys U.S. Solar Start-Up
headline.print_headline: Chinese Firm Buys U.S. Solar Start-Up
